price: 9. Pharaon, ceux qui l’avaient précédé, et les cités renversées[574], avaient commis des fautes.
arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ
footnotes: [574] Les villes de Sodome et Gomorrhe.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wajāa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi-ati
